summary: A simple mod which modifies Lydia the house carl.
descriptionHtml:
[b][color=#000000]-------------------[/color][color=#1155cc]Additions[/color][color=#000000]--------------------
[/color][/b][b]
[color=#1155cc][size=5]Equipment:
[/size][/color][/b][size=5][b][color=#1155cc]1. Dwarven Bow
2. Dwarven Arrows (1000)
3. Dwarven Great Swords

Spells:
1. Healing Hands (Left+Right)
2. Dragon Fire Breath

Shouts:
1. Unrelenting Force

Armour:
[/color][/b][b][color=#1155cc]1. Dwarven (NoHelmet)[/color][/b][/size]

[font=Comic Sans MS][size=6][b][color=#000000]--------------------[/color][color=#1155cc]Desc[/color][color=#000000]-----------------------[/color]
[/b][/size][/font][b]A simple mod which modifies the friendly house carl Lydia. By adding equipment, spells, shouts and armour will make Lydia more powerful for when you're in a sticky situation.
[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#000000][size=6]----------------------------------------------
[/size][/color][/font]Support me by endorsing! <3[/b]
author: KZ90
